category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMCreateToolAssemblyAndComponent
preference.preference_description: Activates advanced functionality to create tool assemblies and components. In the menubar and toolbar two new commands will be available. An additional class selection dialog is displayed and a class specific Item ID (incl. counter) will be generated automatically (see also the MRMToolAssemblyAndComponentIDCounterFormat and MRMToolAssemblyAndComponentIDAutoGenerate preferences). Default value is: true
